```{r}
#| echo: false
#| results: asis
#| cache: false

resources <- yaml::read_yaml("files_for_update/learning-resources.yml")
for (cat in resources) {
  cat_title <- paste0(cat$icon, " ", cat$category)
  cat_desc <- cat$description
  cat_resources <- cat$resources

  cat(paste0("<div class='category'>\n"))
  cat(paste0("<h2>", cat_title, "</h2>\n"))
  cat(paste0("<p class='cat-desc'>", cat_desc, "</p>\n<ul class='resource-list'>\n"))

  for (res in cat_resources) {
    cat(paste0("<li><a href='", res$url, "' target='_blank'><strong>", res$name, "</strong></a>: ", res$description))

    # Authors
    if (!is.null(res$authors)) {
      authors <- paste(res$authors, collapse = ", ")
      cat(paste0("<div class='meta-info'><span class='meta-label'>Authors:</span> ", authors, "</div>"))
    }

    # Community Contributors
    if (!is.null(res$community_contributors)) {
      contributors <- paste(res$community_contributors, collapse = ", ")
      cat(paste0("<div class='meta-info'><span class='meta-label'>Our Community Contributors:</span> ", contributors, "</div>"))
    }

    cat("</li>\n")
  }

  cat("</ul>\n</div>\n")
}


```
